title: Most maps of Louisiana aren't entirely right. Here's what the state really looks like.
text:
Most maps of Louisiana aren't entirely right. Here's what the state really looks like.

The average map of the United States inaccurately portrays the state of Louisiana with more land mass than it actually has.

In 2014, "Matter" published an investigative piece on the state of Louisiana.

Louisiana's coastline is constantly changing and it's sinking faster than all the other contiguous 47 states, combined.

Visit Business Insider's homepage for more stories. EDITOR'S NOTE: This video was originally published on June 16, 2017.
description: The average map of the United States inaccurately portrays the state of Louisiana with more land mass than it actually has.
